title: Leading in Communications and Computer Exports
description: In 2023, Papua New Guinea had 95.93% of its service exports in communications, computer, and related services, one of the highest in the world.

title: High Rural Population
description: As of 2023, 86.28% of Papua New Guinea's population lived in rural areas, making it one of the countries with the highest rural population percentage.

title: Frequent Power Outages
description: In 2015, firms in Papua New Guinea experienced an average of 41.9 power outages per month, one of the highest rates globally.

title: High Informal Payments to Public Officials
description: In 2015, 89.3% of firms in Papua New Guinea reported making informal payments to public officials, indicating a high level of corruption.

title: Low Hospital Bed Availability
description: In 2019, Papua New Guinea had only 0.17 hospital beds per 1,000 people, one of the lowest rates in the world.
